wikipedia_page.main: Francis "Frank" Armstrong (3 October 1839 – 15 June 1899) was the fifth mayor of Salt Lake City, serving from 1886 to 1890.

response: Francis Armstrong may also refer to:
*Francis Armstrong (mayor) (1839–1899), mayor of Salt Lake City
*Sir Francis Armstrong, 3rd Baronet (1871–1944) of the Armstrong baronets
The Francis Armstrong House (also known as Tower Apartments) is a historic house in Salt Lake City, Utah. It is locally significant as a fine example of Queen Anne style architecture.

The 3-1/2 story, Queen Anne style house was built in 1892, and was designed by William Ward and constructed by Taylor, Romney & Armstrong as the home of Salt Lake City mayor Francis Armstrong. and  The scheme of the house is thought to have been brought over by Armstrong from England in 1891, and is apparently based on an English home of the period. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places on May 23, 1980.
